name: Kisume Carry
description:
This is a fan work of the Touhou Project, made in three days for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 7. This game features spider motifs, but there are no actual spiders.

Play the spider-type youkai Yamame as you try to climb out of the dark blowhole to show your friend Kisume the beautiful surface world. Kisume lives in a bucket, so you'll need to use your spider silk creatively to carry her to the surface.

If you get stuck, press R or Gamepad Back to respawn at the last checkpoint.

Supports keyboard, gamepad, and some mouse input.

Keyboard/Mouse Configurations:
- WASD + J/K/L
- Arrow Keys + Z/X/Shift
- Arrows or WASD + Mouse Left, Right, and Middle buttons
- You can also press F10 and F11 to change the window size and scale.
